sentences.english: Have you perished in this deep rancorbitterness?
sentences.chinese: 你已經死在過深的怨憤裏了嗎？

sentences.english: The main animosity will be between America and China.
sentences.chinese: 最主要的怨憤方是美國和中國。

sentences.english: The news roused discontent and indignation of the workers.
sentences.chinese: 這消息激起了工人們的怨憤。

sentences.english: Grumpiness can be a sign of resentment.
sentences.chinese: 情緒暴躁是怨憤的徵兆。

definition: strong in appearance but weak in reality (idiom)
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
to whisper to one another's ear
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
out of ammunition and no food left (idiom); in desperate straits
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
